All Features

Everything You Need to Scale

HubSnap provides creators with AI-powered tools, real-time insights, and proven frameworks to build sustainable media businesses.

AI-Powered Content Generation

Generate high-retention scripts, video ideas, and content packs using advanced AI models trained on millions of viral videos.

Real-Time Trend Detection

Spot viral topics 48 hours before they peak. Stay ahead of the curve and maximize your content's reach.

Advanced Analytics Dashboard

Deep insights into audience behavior, retention metrics, and performance analytics across all your channels.

650+ AI Tools Directory

Curated collection of the best AI tools for creators. Filter by category, pricing, and use case to find your perfect match.

Knowledge Base & Guides

Freelancing kits, templates, and blueprints to help you execute faster. Learn from proven strategies and frameworks.

Income Tracking

Monitor all your revenue streams in one place. Track affiliate earnings, sponsorships, and ad revenue effortlessly.

Channel Ideas Generator

Discover profitable niche ideas with AI-powered suggestions. Get complete channel blueprints with monetization strategies.

Multi-Platform Support

Manage content for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and more from a single dashboard. Cross-platform analytics included.

Audience Insight Engine

Analyze real audience comments from Instagram, YouTube, and competitor channels. Discover what your audience actually wants based on evidence, not guesswork.

AI Audiobook Studio

Convert written content into professional audiobook videos automatically. Choose from preset editing styles and let AI handle the rendering in the background.

Textography Reels Generator

Create engaging text-based Instagram Reels without showing your face or using your voice. Generate viral content in under 2 minutes with animated text and music.

Snap Clipper (Auto Clip Generator)

Extract the best moments from long-form videos into viral short clips automatically. AI detects engaging moments and converts them to vertical format with auto-subtitles.

Content Lifespan Optimizer

Transform one content idea into multiple platform-specific formats. Maximize reach and consistency by repurposing content across YouTube, Instagram, LinkedIn, and more.

Hook Effectiveness Tester

Score your content hooks before posting to predict performance. Get AI-powered improvement suggestions based on curiosity, clarity, and emotional pull metrics.

Creator Consistency Tracker

Track your creative momentum and prevent burnout with intelligent insights. Monitor active days, streaks, and consistency scores with gentle, supportive feedback.
